query:
INSERT INTO blog_posts (title, slug, excerpt, content, featuredImageUrl, categoryId, author, isPublished, publishedAt, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES

('SEO Optimization for E-commerce Businesses', 'seo-optimization-ecommerce', 'Learn how to optimize your e-commerce site for search engines with technical SEO, keyword research, product page optimization, and link building strategies.', 'For e-commerce businesses, organic search traffic represents one of the most valuable and cost-effective customer acquisition channels. Unlike paid advertising, which stops generating traffic the moment you stop paying, SEO creates a compounding asset that generates traffic month after month with minimal ongoing investment. This comprehensive guide covers technical SEO, keyword research, product page optimization, and link building strategies specifically for e-commerce sites.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-2_1770937178000_na1fn_YmxvZy1zZW8tb3B0aW1pemF0aW9u.png', 2, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Paid Advertising Strategy Guide', 'paid-advertising-strategy', 'Master paid advertising across Google Ads, Facebook, and Instagram with strategies for channel selection, landing pages, conversion tracking, and scaling profitable campaigns.', 'Paid advertising is the fastest way to generate qualified leads and drive sales. Unlike organic channels that take months to produce results, paid advertising can generate leads within hours of launching a campaign. This guide walks you through the framework we use to build profitable paid campaigns for clients across multiple industries, including understanding unit economics, channel selection, landing page optimization, and systematic testing.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-3_1770937166000_na1fn_YmxvZy1wYWlkLWFkcy1zdHJhdGVneQ.png', 3, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Email Marketing Best Practices', 'email-marketing-best-practices', 'Discover how to build high-performing email programs with list building, segmentation, personalization, automation, and continuous optimization strategies.', 'Email marketing remains one of the highest-ROI marketing channels available. For every dollar spent on email marketing, businesses generate an average of $42 in return. Yet many businesses underinvest in email or treat it as an afterthought, missing out on significant revenue opportunities. This guide covers building your email list, segmentation, personalization, automation, and measuring performance.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-4_1770937177000_na1fn_YmxvZy1lbWFpbC1tYXJrZXRpbmc.png', 1, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Conversion Rate Optimization Techniques', 'conversion-rate-optimization', 'Master CRO with landing page optimization, psychology of conversion, A/B testing, and data-driven techniques to increase your conversion rates.', 'Conversion rate optimization (CRO) is the process of improving the percentage of website visitors who take a desired action. A small improvement in conversion rate can dramatically impact your revenue. If you''re currently converting 2% of visitors and you improve that to 3%, you''ve increased revenue by 50% without spending a single additional dollar on traffic. This guide covers understanding your baseline, psychology of conversion, landing page optimization, and systematic testing.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-5_1770937183000_na1fn_YmxvZy1jb252ZXJzaW9uLW9wdGltaXphdGlvbg.png', 1, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('AI in Marketing: Automation and Personalization', 'ai-marketing-automation-personalization', 'Explore how to leverage AI for marketing automation, predictive analytics, lead scoring, chatbots, and personalized customer experiences at scale.', 'Artificial intelligence is transforming marketing. AI-powered tools can analyze customer data to predict behavior, automate repetitive tasks, personalize experiences at scale, and identify patterns that humans would miss. The companies that master AI in marketing will have a significant competitive advantage. This guide covers AI applications in lead scoring, predictive analytics, chatbots, content generation, and personalization.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-6_1770937189000_na1fn_YmxvZy1haS1tYXJrZXRpbmc.png', 3, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Social Media Strategy for Business Growth', 'social-media-strategy-business', 'Build a winning social media strategy with goal setting, audience research, content planning, engagement tactics, and performance measurement.', 'Social media has become an essential marketing channel for most businesses. Yet many companies treat social media as an afterthought, posting sporadically without a clear strategy. The most successful social media programs start with clear goals, deep audience understanding, consistent content, and continuous optimization. This guide covers defining your social media goals, understanding your audience, creating a content calendar, and measuring performance.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-7_1770937195000_na1fn_YmxvZy1zb2NpYWwtbWVkaWE.png', 2, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Customer Retention Strategies for Multifamily', 'customer-retention-multifamily', 'Learn proven strategies to improve resident retention, reduce turnover, and increase lifetime value in multifamily properties through service excellence and loyalty programs.', 'In the multifamily industry, resident retention directly impacts your bottom line. Losing a resident and finding a replacement costs significantly more than retaining an existing resident. The most profitable multifamily properties focus on creating exceptional resident experiences that encourage renewals and positive word-of-mouth. This guide covers understanding resident needs, service excellence, loyalty programs, and retention measurement.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-8_1770937201000_na1fn_YmxvZy1yZXRlbnRpb24.png', 1, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Advanced Analytics and Reporting', 'advanced-analytics-reporting', 'Master advanced analytics with attribution modeling, cohort analysis, custom dashboards, and data-driven decision making for marketing optimization.', 'Data-driven decision making separates successful marketing teams from mediocre ones. Yet many marketing teams struggle with analytics, collecting data but not using it to drive decisions. This guide covers setting up proper analytics infrastructure, attribution modeling, cohort analysis, creating actionable dashboards, and using data to optimize marketing performance.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-9_1770937207000_na1fn_YmxvZy1hbmFseXRpY3M.png', 2, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Marketing Automation for Lead Nurturing', 'marketing-automation-lead-nurturing', 'Implement marketing automation workflows for lead nurturing, CRM integration, and automated follow-up sequences that scale your business.', 'Marketing automation allows you to nurture leads at scale without requiring a large team. Automated workflows can send personalized emails, score leads based on engagement, route leads to sales at the right time, and track the entire customer journey. This guide covers setting up marketing automation platforms, creating effective workflows, CRM integration, and measuring automation ROI.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-10_1770937213000_na1fn_YmxvZy1hdXRvbWF0aW9u.png', 3, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW());

This guide covers understanding your baseline, psychology of conversion, landing page optimization, and systematic testing.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-5_1770937183000_na1fn_YmxvZy1jb252ZXJzaW9uLW9wdGltaXphdGlvbg.png', 1, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

The companies that master AI in marketing will have a significant competitive advantage. This guide covers AI applications in lead scoring, predictive analytics, chatbots, content generation, and personalization.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-6_1770937189000_na1fn_YmxvZy1haS1tYXJrZXRpbmc.png', 3, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Social Media Strategy for Business Growth', 'social-media-strategy-business', 'Build a winning social media strategy with goal setting, audience research, content planning, engagement tactics, and performance measurement.', 'Social media has become an essential marketing channel for most businesses. Yet many companies treat social media as an afterthought, posting sporadically without a clear strategy. The most successful social media programs start with clear goals, deep audience understanding, consistent content, and continuous optimization. This guide covers defining your social media goals, understanding your audience, creating a content calendar, and measuring performance.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-7_1770937195000_na1fn_YmxvZy1zb2NpYWwtbWVkaWE.png', 2, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Customer Retention Strategies for Multifamily', 'customer-retention-multifamily', 'Learn proven strategies to improve resident retention, reduce turnover, and increase lifetime value in multifamily properties through service excellence and loyalty programs.', 'In the multifamily industry, resident retention directly impacts your bottom line. The most profitable multifamily properties focus on creating exceptional resident experiences that encourage renewals and positive word-of-mouth. This guide covers understanding resident needs, service excellence, loyalty programs, and retention measurement.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-8_1770937201000_na1fn_YmxvZy1yZXRlbnRpb24.png', 1, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Advanced Analytics and Reporting', 'advanced-analytics-reporting', 'Master advanced analytics with attribution modeling, cohort analysis, custom dashboards, and data-driven decision making for marketing optimization.', 'Data-driven decision making separates successful marketing teams from mediocre ones. Yet many marketing teams struggle with analytics, collecting data but not using it to drive decisions. This guide covers setting up proper analytics infrastructure, attribution modeling, cohort analysis, creating actionable dashboards, and using data to optimize marketing performance.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-9_1770937207000_na1fn_YmxvZy1hbmFseXRpY3M.png', 2, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW()),

('Marketing Automation for Lead Nurturing', 'marketing-automation-lead-nurturing', 'Implement marketing automation workflows for lead nurturing, CRM integration, and automated follow-up sequences that scale your business.', 'Marketing automation allows you to nurture leads at scale without requiring a large team. Automated workflows can send personalized emails, score leads based on engagement, route leads to sales at the right time, and track the entire customer journey. This guide covers setting up marketing automation platforms, creating effective workflows, CRM integration, and measuring automation ROI.', 'https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/gdoMzMLMX7RpezMxgQSeYN/sandbox/3U2nSU5WS6MGxpObz4vErs-img-10_1770937213000_na1fn_YmxvZy1hdXRvbWF0aW9u.png', 3, 'Michael Schott', true, NOW(), NOW(), NOW());
